Summary: Awoke at 4:15AM and looked out towards the Eastern sky to see a very bright orb/disc-like object never before observed in that direction at that height. Object glowed too brightly to be a star and was too close to be a planet.
divs: sighting detailsawoke at 4:15am and looked out towards the eastern sky to see a very bright orb\disc-like object never before observed in that direction at that height (about 30 degrees above the horizon). woke my wife up to observe along with me. object glowed too brightly to be a star and was too close to be a planet. captured a cell-phone picture of it. object gradually faded away towards the east becoming smaller as it left. it was gone by 4:45am. definitely a ufo! we are believers now!
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in South Kingstown
There were no other sightings in South Kingstown on or around July 10th 2012
